name: 2024 4th International Conference on Intelligent Technology and Embedded Systems
content: Proceedings: Accepted and presented full papers of ICITES 2024 will be published by Conference Proceedings. The proceedings will be indexed by EI Compendex and Scopus, etc. after the conference. Journals: Selected papers will be recommended to the following SCI journals: -Journal of Electronic Science and Technologyï¼ˆISSN: 1674-862X) Indexing: Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc. -Journal of Systems Architecture (ISSN: 1383-7621) Indexing: SCI, Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc. Impact Factor: 5.836 -Journal of Circuits, Systems and Computers (ISSN: 0218-1266) Indexing: SCIE, Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc. Impact Factor: 1.278 -Computer Systems Science and Engineering (ISSN: 0267-6192) Indexing: SCI, Scopus, ACM Digital Library Impact Factor: 4.397
organizers: IEEE CEDA Chengdu Section and IEEE EDS Chengdu Section
